name: Tomato Firmware - Dark Grey Theme
description:
This style redecorates the web admin of Tomato Firmware used on Linksys or other compatible routers.

Like this theme? Perhaps you'd be interested in these ...

style 6185

================================================================================================================================
Important Notes:
#1. If your routers ip address is something other than 192.168.1.1, you'll need to edit domain("192.168.1.1") to reflect the proper ip address.
#2. If you have multiple tomato-powered routers you wish to apply this theme to, do it like so... domain("192.168.1.1"), domain("192.168.2.1"), domain("192.168.3.1")
================================================================================================================================
css:
/* AGENT_SHEET */
/*
 * Tomato Firmware - Dark Grey Theme
 *
 * Author      : Rhino
 * Updated     : June 19th, 2008
 * Description : Modifies the colors, logos, and images for Tomato Firmware (http://www.polarcloud.com/tomato/)
 * Usage       : Use with the Stylish Firefox extension (http://userstyles.org/) or copy to your Firefox userContent.css file
 *
 * ATTENTION! you may need to adjust -moz-document domain below to reflect your router's ip address
 */
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("192.168.1.1")
{html * {color:#C9AE96 !important}table#container{width:1280px !important;}body,td#navi a,tr.header td,tr.header td a,pre#stats,span.brate,td.title,td.content{color:#C9AE96 !important;}a:link,a:visited,a:hover,td#header *,td#navi a:hover,td#navi .active,#footer-msg,div.section-title,input[type=button],.tomato-grid a,#ident{color:#FF7800 !important;}td#header,td#navi a,td#navi a:hover,div.section-title,div.section,pre,div#rstats,div#bwm-daily-grid,div#bwm-weekly-grid,div#bwm-monthly-grid,table#tp-grid,table#ttr-grid,#ident{background-color:#333 !important;}td#navi a{border-bottom:1px solid #111 !important}table.fields td.title,table.fields td.content{background-color:transparent !important;border:1px solid #111 !important;}tr.odd,tr.even,.tomato-grid .footer,.tomato-grid .editor,.tomato-grid .controls,tr.footer{background:#222 !important;}tr.odd:hover,tr.even:hover{background:#111 !important;}ul#tabs li *,textarea *,input[type=text],input[type=text] *,input[type=password],input[type=password] *,select,select *{color:#000 !important;}ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-eth0,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-eth1,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-eth2,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-br0,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-eth0.active,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-eth1.active,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-eth2.active,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-br0.active,ul#tabs li a#as-init,ul#tabs li a#as-shut,ul#tabs li a#as-fire,ul#tabs li a#as-wanup,ul#tabs li a#as-init.active,ul#tabs li a#as-shut.active,ul#tabs li a#as-fire.active,ul#tabs li a#as-wanup.active,textarea,textarea.as-script,input[type=text],input[type=password],select{background:#fff !important;}ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-eth0.active,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-eth1.active,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-eth2.active,ul#tabs li a#speed-tab-br0.active,ul#tabs li a#as-init.active,ul#tabs li a#as-shut.active,ul#tabs li a#as-fire.active,ul#tabs li a#as-wanup.active{border-bottom:1px solid #fff !important;}span.brate{color:#0ff !important;}span.grate{color:#bcee68 !important;}textarea,textarea.as-script,input[type=text],input[type=password],select{border-top:1px solid #202020 !important;border-left:1px solid #202020 !important;border-bottom:1px solid #606060 !important;border-right:1px solid #606060 !important;}input[type=button]{-moz-appearance:none !important; border-top:1px solid #484848 !important;border-left:1px solid #484848 !important;border-bottom:1px solid #000 !important;border-right:1px solid #000 !important;}input[type=button]:focus{-moz-appearance:none !important; border-top:1px solid #000 !important;border-left:1px solid #000 !important;border-bottom:1px solid #484848 !important;border-right:1px solid #484848 !important;}input[type=button]:disabled{-moz-appearance:none !important; color:#8d8d8d !important;}table.tomato-grid .disabled{color:#999 !important;}body,#footer-msg,tr.header,input[type=button]{-moz-appearance:none !important; background-color:#111 !important;}html *{float:none !important;font-size:12px !important;-moz-outline:none !important;-moz-border-radius:0 !important;margin:0 !important;padding:0 !important;}body{background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,) !important;background-position:top left !important;background-repeat:repeat-x !important;background-attachment:fixed !important;text-align:center !important;}a:hover{background-color:transparent !important;text-decoration:underline !important;}table#container{background-color:transparent !important;overflow:hidden !important;margin:5px auto 0 !important;}td#header{border:none !important;padding:10px !important;}td#header *{font-size:1.4em !important;line-height:61px !important;}td#header div.title{background:transparent url(data:image/png;base64,) no-repeat center left !important;float:left !important;padding-left:185px !important;margin-right:6px !important;width:380px !important;}td#header div.title:before{content:'Powered By ' !important;}td#header div.title:after{content:' Firmware' !important;}td#header div.version{float:right !important;}td#navi{border-right:none !important;text-align:left !important;width:220px !important;padding:5px 5px 0 0 !important;}td#navi *{width:220px !important;}td#navi a{line-height:16px !important;padding:2px 0 !important;}td#navi a:hover{background-image:none !important;text-decoration:none !important;}td#navi a.indent1{text-indent:5px !important;}td#navi a.indent2{text-indent:35px !important;}td#navi .active{font-style:italic !important;}td#content{width:100% !important;padding:5px 0 !important;}td#footer{text-align:right !important;border-top:none !important;}#footer-msg{margin-right:10px !important;padding:2px 10px !important;}div.section-title{border:none !important;font-weight:700 !important;text-align:left !important;margin:0 0 5px !important;padding:3px !important;}table{background-color:transparent !important;border:none !important;}tr.header{}table.fields td.title{width:216px !important;padding:5px !important;}table.fields td.content{padding:5px !important;}.sortasc{background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAsAAAAGCAYAAAAVMmT4AAAABGdBTUEAAK/INwWK6QAAABl0RVh0U29mdHdhcmUAQWRvYmUgSW1hZ2VSZWFkeXHJZTwAAAA9SURBVHjaYvz//z8DsQAggJiwit5gxGoCQAAx4VSIRQNAADFhVajxnxGbBoAAYsKpEIsGgABiJMWDAAEGABB5FmXsBSOkAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC) !important;background-position:97% center !important;background-repeat:no-repeat !important;}.sortdes{background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAsAAAAGCAYAAAAVMmT4AAAABGdBTUEAAK/INwWK6QAAABl0RVh0U29mdHdhcmUAQWRvYmUgSW1hZ2VSZWFkeXHJZTwAAABMSURBVHjaYvz//z8DsQAggJjgrBuM/8EYGaCJAQQQQrHGf0a4AmQaJg4EAAHEiOEMZNORFIIAQAAxgBRj4OsgClMcIIAYSfEgQIABALMPOhZRrt/FAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC) !important;background-position:97% center !important;background-repeat:no-repeat !important;}td.spacer{display:none !important;}b{font-weight:700 !important;}pre{background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAABECAYAAABAgF9WAAAABGdBTUEAAK/INwWK6QAAABl0RVh0U29mdHdhcmUAQWRvYmUgSW1hZ2VSZWFkeXHJZTwAAAAiSURBVHjaYmIAAiYYwchEHJcICZJY1FFCpmLS/UaACxBgAHFiAKjTgYg3AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC) !important;background-position:bottom left !important;background-repeat:repeat-x !important;text-align:left !important;width:1280px !important;margin:0 auto !important;padding:5px !important;}pre#stats{width:100% !important;margin:0 1px !important;}ul#tabs{margin:5px 0 0 40px !important;}ul#tabs li{float:left !important;}ul#tabs li a{margin:0 1px 1px 0 !important;padding:3px !important;}ul#tabs li a:hover{font-weight:400 !important;text-decoration:none !important;}ul#tabs li a.active{font-weight:400 !important;margin:0 1px 0 0 !important;}#tabs-bottom{border-top:none !important;}div#rstats{background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAABECAYAAABAgF9WAAAABGdBTUEAAK/INwWK6QAAABl0RVh0U29mdHdhcmUAQWRvYmUgSW1hZ2VSZWFkeXHJZTwAAAAiSURBVHjaYmIAAiYYwchEHJcICZJY1FFCpmLS/UaACxBgAHFiAKjTgYg3AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC) !important;background-position:bottom left !important;background-repeat:repeat-x !important;padding:5px !important;}div#bwm-daily-grid,div#bwm-weekly-grid,div#bwm-monthly-grid{float:left !important;background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAABECAYAAABAgF9WAAAABGdBTUEAAK/INwWK6QAAABl0RVh0U29mdHdhcmUAQWRvYmUgSW1hZ2VSZWFkeXHJZTwAAAAiSURBVHjaYmIAAiYYwchEHJcICZJY1FFCpmLS/UaACxBgAHFiAKjTgYg3AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC) !important;background-position:bottom left !important;background-repeat:repeat-x !important;width:99% !important;margin:0 0 5px !important;padding:5px !important;}table.bwmg{background-color:transparent !important;border:none !important;width:100% !important;}#graph{float:left !important;margin-right:5px !important;border:none !important;}div#survey-controls{margin-top:20px !important;}div#survey-msg{margin-left:1px !important;}div#survey-msg,div#rstats table#txt{background:transparent !important;clear:both !important;margin-top:5px !important;border:none !important;}textarea{width:99% !important;margin:0 !important;padding:1px 3px !important;}textarea.as-script{border-top:none !important;margin:0 !important;padding:5px 3px 1px !important;}textarea#_sshd_authkeys,textarea#_f_mac,textarea#_f_block_http,textarea#_dnsmasq_custom{width:98.5% !important;}input[type=text],input[type=password]{margin:0 !important;padding:1px 3px !important;}input[type=button]{-moz-appearance:none !important; background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAAVCAYAAACHUoQEAAAABGdBTUEAAK/INwWK6QAAABl0RVh0U29mdHdhcmUAQWRvYmUgSW1hZ2VSZWFkeXHJZTwAAABsSURBVHjaYvj//78CQAAxMQABQACBiH8AAQQmAAIITAAEEIj4DxBAYBZAAIFZAAEEJgACCET8AQggEPEbIIBABBNAAIEJgAACEYwAAQQmAAIITAAEEFgMIIDALIAAAhMAAQTmAgQQ2HiAAAMAxFUMPyKZT7AAAAAASUVORK5CYII=) !important;background-position:center center !important;background-repeat:repeat-x !important;min-width:80px !important;margin-left:3px !important;margin-right:0 !important;cursor:pointer !important;}input[type='button']:hover{-moz-appearance:none !important; background-image:none !important}input[type=button]:disabled{-moz-appearance:none !important; cursor:not-allowed !important;}input#_wl_bcn,input#_f_distance,input#_wl_dtim,input#_wl_frag,input#_wl_maxassoc,input#_wl_rts,input#_wl_txpwr{width:92px !important;}select#scale,select#startwk,select#shmode,select#_wk_mode,select#_dr_setting,select#_wl_afterburner,select#_wl_ap_isolate,select#_wl_auth,select#_wl_rateset,select#_wl_gmode_protection,select#_wl_frameburst,select#_wlx_hpamp,select#_wlx_hperx,select#_wl_mrate,select#_wl_plcphdr,select#_wl_antdiv,select#_wl_txant,select#_wl_rate,select#_wl_wme,select#_wl_wme_no_ack{width:100px !important;}select#_mtu_enable,select#_wan_proto{width:130px !important;}select#_f_dhcpd_sltsel{width:240px !important;}input[type=checkbox]{margin:0 !important;}table#dev-grid{margin-bottom:10px !important;}.tomato-grid a:hover{background:transparent !important;text-decoration:underline !important;}table.fields{width:100% !important;margin:0 !important;}td#content ul{list-style-position:inside !important;}#ident{border:none !important;font-weight:700 !important;margin:0 0 5px !important;padding:3px !important;}#ident:before{content:'Logged in to \'' !important;}#ident:after{content:'\'' !important;}table,table td,table td tr,select{margin:0 !important;padding:0 !important;}div.section,table#tp-grid,table#ttr-grid{background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAABECAYAAABAgF9WAAAABGdBTUEAAK/INwWK6QAAABl0RVh0U29mdHdhcmUAQWRvYmUgSW1hZ2VSZWFkeXHJZTwAAAAiSURBVHjaYmIAAiYYwchEHJcICZJY1FFCpmLS/UaACxBgAHFiAKjTgYg3AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC) !important;background-position:bottom left !important;background-repeat:repeat-x !important;margin:0 0 5px !important;padding:5px !important;}table td,div#rstats div#bwm-controls{text-align:left !important;}table.tomato-grid td,table#dev-grid td,table.bwmg td{padding:3px !important;}#qg .x1a{width:35% !important;float:left !important;}#qg .x1b{width:64% !important;float:left !important;}#qg .x2a{width:35% !important;float:left !important;clear:left !important;}#qg .x2b{width:23% !important;float:left !important;}#qg .x2c{width:41% !important;float:left !important;}#qg .x3a{width:40% !important;float:left !important;clear:left !important;}#qg .x3b{width:60% !important;float:left !important;}#qg .x4a{float:left !important;clear:left !important;width:70px !important;}#qg .x4b{float:left !important;width:10px !important;text-align:center !important;padding:2px 8px 0 !important;}#qg .x4c{float:left !important;width:70px !important;}#qg .x4d{float:left !important;width:100px !important;padding:2px 0 0 8px !important;}td#navi br {display:none !important;}
/* Spin Icon */
img[src$="spin.gif"] {
width:0px!important;
height:0px!important;
padding-left:20px!important;
padding-top:20px!important;
background-position: top left !important;
background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,) !important;}
/* Wirless Signal Strength Icons */
img[src$="bar1.gif"] {
width:0px!important;
height:0px!important;
padding-left:19px!important;
padding-top:9px!important;
background-position: top left !important;
background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABMAAAAJCAYAAADQHRcxAAAABGdBTUEAAK/INwWK6QAAABl0RVh0U29mdHdhcmUAQWRvYmUgSW1hZ2VSZWFkeXHJZTwAAABjSURBVHjaYvz//z8DhQBmACNAADFRYACGKwACiIlSA5ABQAAxUWoAMgAIICZKDUAGAAEENmwnI+P/I0BMaUwABBALiPgOxMwMlAOAAAK77BcQ/6SCYQABBDbsL9RASgFAgAEAkSwUbJJlBXAAAAAASUVORK5CYII=) !important;
